text: it's completely normal for me to have an
end and I don't feel any different from
any other part of my body
well the antenna is implanted inside my
head and it allows me to hear the sound
of colors so it's a light sensor that
picks up the light frequencies in front
of me then these light frequencies
become vibrations in my bone and the
vibrations travel through my skull and
they become sounds to my inner ear so
it's actually a vibration that becomes a
sound and each color has its own light
vibration so each color vibrates
differently in my head which then
corresponds to a different note or
different sound so I was actually born
completely colorblind which is called a
chromaticism and I didn't know this
until I was 11 this project started in
2003 so the first prototype was a webcam
connected to a 5 kilo computer and a
pair of headphones so I was actually
using my ears at the beginning to hear
color but I didn't like this because I
was blocking an existing sense so I
wanted to have a new sense for color
independently from sight and from
hearing that's why I decided to create a
new organ which I decided would be an
antenna at the moment there's four
implants at the back of my head two are
for the antenna to hold the third
implant is a chip that vibrates
depending on the light frequencies and
the fourth implant is internet
connection that allows me to receive
colors from other parts of the world or
from satellites so it keeps evolving and
the next stage now is to add also a
Bluetooth tooth in my mouth that will
allow me to control the antenna
